items.contentEnglish:
Create product images using this character

Ultra-realistic product photos.  
Subject: Virtual holographic character [CHARACTER], floating above a modern desktop with a circular holographic projector (diameter 120mm).  
Projection source rules:  
- If the reference object is a 3D model, place a desktop 3D scanner beside the projector.  
Position the reference object on the scanning platform.  
The hologram above the projector is generated from the scanned object.  
- If the reference object is a 2D image, place a modern PC with a monitor on the desktop.  
Display the reference image on the monitor screen.  
The hologram above the projector is generated from the screen content.  

Hologram rendering rules:  
- The character is always shown as a semi-transparent volumetric image, with the background faintly visible.  
- No beams, particles, or solid statue surfaces.  
- Balanced anatomy (head-to-body ratio approximately 1/7-1/8), correct proportions.  
- Natural pose, clear silhouette.  
- Hair, clothing folds, and accessories are visible but semi-transparent.  
- The face is clear and expressive, readable at 1000px crop.  
- No copyright characters, no branding, no IP marks.  

Environment: modern office desk with projector base and auxiliary equipment (scanner or monitor).  
Camera: 85-100mm lens, 3/4 hero angle, eye level, f/11-f/16, ISO 100, tripod.  
Lighting: soft desktop lighting; holographic character defined solely by volumetric light.  
Background: seamless black studio with subtle reflections.  
Output: 4:5 aspect ratio, 2048Ã—2560 pixels.  
Negative prompts: no text, watermarks, logos, branding, IP characters, series marks, trademarks, resin, PVC, physical statues, opaque surfaces, toy gloss, beams, scan lines, dots, distortions, extraneous digits.  
Sampling: deterministic, Seed=12345, Temperature=0.  
> [!NOTE]  
> **Replace [CHARACTER] with your specific character name**  

A hyper-realistic full-body shot of a person taking a selfie, surrounded by scaffolding. Tiny construction workers are working on the scaffolding. Scene set in a city square with modern buildings, moving vehicles (cars, buses), pedestrians, and a bright blue sky. Rich details, photo-realistic quality, cinematic lighting.  

Remove everything except the buildings from the image.  

Cut out each component and create models with holographic overlays.  

Extract all ingredients from a burger, leaving only the top and bottom buns with a gap in between as if the filling is still inside.  

Enhance the resolution of this old image, add appropriate textures, and reinterpret it with modern anime techniques.  

Convert the image to an isometric view.  

Please generate multiple 16:9 graffiti-style images explaining the concept of "the future" to middle school students. Use a consistent colorful crayon hand-drawn style, rich in information, include English text, with a solid background, outlined cards, and a unified title, similar to PowerPoint slides.  

Use Image 2 as a reference to generate [x] emoticons with various expressions.  
> [!NOTE]  
> **Replace [x] with the number of emoticons needed**  

Restore the half-eaten [XX] to its original state before being eaten.  
> [!NOTE]  
> **Replace [XX] with the name of the food item**  

Create a mid-speed action scene with two subjects in a three-quarter view, clearly focused, posing martial arts fighting stances. They are in the same movie scene. Remove the central line, background is a blurry, collapsing ruin in a purple alien world. Shot at sunrise. Modern fighting game health bars, Morton vs. Death Seed. Powerful moves, HUD-style effects. Include thumbnails of each character in the health bars. Add cool glowing effects!  

Create a cross-section diagram of a car, showing the full exterior on one side and internal engine and seats on the other. Keep proportions accurate, with detailed realism.  

Use the original image to redraw a pirate wanted poster on parchment paper.  
Brown monochrome, with aged parchment texture.  
Retain the original style and character design down to the smallest detail, and paste a large version of the characterâ€™s face at the top of the poster.  
Close-up of the face. Have the character wear a pirate hat.  
Write the bounty amount at the bottom of the poster, using a random virtual currency.  
Below the bounty, in small lowercase letters, write the crime in a fictional language (no English or Chinese).  

Remove the background of this illustration, transforming it into a collectible figure-style merchandise.  
Image: photorealistic.  
Location: a Japanese fictional convenience store shelf. Cute and

items.contentEnglish:
Illustration Processing:
Background erased; characters transformed into figures and merchandise.
Theme / Overview:
Realistic interior of a Tokyo train. The entire carriage is decorated with character advertisements and merchandise, creating a special space designed for collaboration events.
Characters / Display:
Several cosplayers stand in the foreground.
Life-sized figures and character merchandise are displayed in the middle and rear of the train.
100cm tall character figures are showcased within the carriage.
Many plush toys of characters are arranged on empty seats.
Advertisements / Exhibits:
Character illustrations appear on hanging strap ads inside the carriage.
Character artwork is featured on posters and advertisements inside the train.
Additional LED screens display character illustrations and animations.
Illustration Details:
Background erased; characters transformed into figures and merchandise.
Realistically depicted life-sized figures, 100cm figures, chibi figures, and plush toys.
Photography Angle:
Frontal composition emphasizing the busy interior of the train.
Wide shot of cosplayers in the foreground, with figures, display boards, and plush toys in the background.
Low-angle shot to highlight hanging strap ads and LED screens.
Image Quality / Atmosphere:
Realistic and detailed.
Urban, authentic gloss and lighting.
Resolution 4K, aspect ratio 4:3.

items.contentEnglish:
Generate a realistic image of a theme park based on the original picture.  
The theme park and its characters should be depicted in an extremely realistic style. The scene is set during daytime with bright sunshine.  
Extract the color scheme and design elements from the original image and apply them to various attractions and facilities.  
Elements included in the image should be: vehicles and buildings designed based on the original image, mascot costumes that are moderately exaggerated but inspired by the original image, and signs featuring the original image.  
The mascot costumes should incorporate elements from the original image but be slightly stylized to enhance realism.  
The sizes of characters and mascot costumes must be proportionate and realistic; no exaggerated or unrealistic proportions are allowed.  
Even if the original image is in an anime style, the final generated image must depict a realistic theme park.  
Please strictly follow these instructions.

items.contentEnglish:
Create an image of a fictional constellation based on the original picture.  
- The starry night background must be realistic, even if the original image is in anime style; a convincing starry sky effect is required.  
- Extract characters, animals, or objects from the original image and overlay them transparently onto the starry background. In this case, the extracted subject should be a single main element (primary motif), and only one image should be used.  
- The character design, style, and aesthetic of the original image must be faithfully preserved; the original background can be ignored.  
- Based on the placed main element, create a fictional constellation. The constellation should consist of approximately 5 to 10 stars.  
- Analyze the pose of the original subject, and arrange the stars of the constellation at key points corresponding to the character or object.  
- The stars of the constellation should be highlighted and connected with glowing lines to form the shape of the constellation.

items.contentEnglish:
Analyze the uploaded photo to detect its main subject, mood, and atmosphere.  
Automatically categorize the photo into an appropriate film genre (romance, action, mystery, horror, etc.).  
Based on the detected genre and mood, generate the following in English:  
- **Movie Title:** Impactful and fitting the style of the genre.  
- **Short Tagline / Slogan:** 1â€“2 lines, dramatic or emotionally evocative.  
- **Production Credits:** Include fictional names for director, producer, composer, etc., styled like a real movie poster.  
- **Release Information:** Such as â€œCOMING SOONâ€ or â€œIn Theaters 2025.â€  

Overlay these elements onto the photo to create a movie poster style:  
- The title prominently displayed in the center or bottom third.  
- The tagline placed above or below the title.  
- Production credits at the bottom in smaller text.  
- Release information at the bottom center.  
- Add starring information in the following fixed format:  
  **"Starring: <Actor Name>"**  
  Font style: bold, dramatic, matching the genre.  

The final result should resemble a real cinema poster, with all elements harmonized to match the photoâ€™s emotional tone and atmosphere.

items.contentEnglish:
A hyper-realistic, professional interior design photography shot showcasing a modern living room inspired by [Superhero]. The room features clean lines with a color palette dominated by gray, black, and white, accented by [theme color] highlights. A large stylized 3D wall sculpture of a [Superhero] serves as the focal point on the main wall. 

The decor includes detailed thematic elements such as blueprint-style framed art prints, a floor lamp inspired by specific elements (like a shield or emblem), and a side table with a few props like a stylized helmet. The furniture is modern and minimalist, with a large, comfortable sofa paired with a low coffee table. Dramatic accent lighting highlights the main wall sculpture, while warm ambient light from windows and fixtures creates a cozy atmosphere.

The overall style is refined and elegant, subtly paying homage to the superhero theme without being overtly fan-centric.

A shelf in a fictional convenience store in Japan. The cute and trendy atmosphere complements the neatly arranged illustrated merchandise. The store interior is brightly lit and dreamlike, creating a unique space that excites fans.

These merchandise items are displayed on the shelves.

- Chibi-style dolls (original work stylized version)  
- Pillows (large printed items, prominently displayed)

Merchandise is neatly arranged on the shelves, maintaining the convenience store vibe while showing love for the characters. The way the items are displayed makes young female fans eager to pick them up.

items.contentEnglish:
A cutting-edge contemporary art exhibition space centered around a reference image.  
The entire gallery (20.0 meters x 20.0 meters x 8.0 meters) integrates architecture, lighting, flooring, walls, and ceiling into the artistic expression.  
At the deepest part of the gallery stands a large wall measuring 20 meters wide and 8 meters high, featuring a monumental artistic display of the theme from the reference image at its center. The image is crisp and three-dimensional, rising towards viewers and becoming the focal point of the space.  
A system-generated exhibition title plaque will be installed below the center of the wall. The title must be abstract, symbolic, poetic, and must qualify as a contemporary art piece. No price display will be shown in the exhibition.  
The flooring is polished granite with a reflectivity of 0.35 to 0.40. Patterns and light derived from the reference image are layered across the surface, resonating with the entire space as if responding to visitorsâ€™ footsteps. Tactile paving tiles with similar color are seamlessly integrated, only 5 millimeters thick, with a clear tactile feel. The artwork extends in a straight line from the entrance to the large wall, creating a pause point in front of the piece. After viewing, visitors are naturally guided toward the right-side opening (3 meters wide x 3 meters high). In case of emergency, emergency floor lighting ensures an illumination of at least 1 lux.  
The walls and ceiling on both sides interpret abstract versions of specific elements from the reference image in different ways, transforming the artwork itself into a piece of art. The flow of color, form, and light unifies the entire space into a cohesive artistic experience.  
Visitor capacity is limited to 8â€“25 people. All visitors face the large wall, move along a straight line, and pause at designated stopping points. No one looks back toward the entrance. Only one staff member is stationed near the right entrance of the large wall. All faces are blurred to ensure anonymity.  
The composition is stable, with the vanishing point always centered on the large wall. Verticality is within Â±0.5Â°. Floor reflections are precise, and human figures appear natural. Hands always have five fingers; eyes are symmetrical with deviations within 3%. Fabrics are kept flat without deformation.  
Prohibited content includes: elements unrelated to the reference image; missing or damaged tactile paving; visitors facing the entrance; logos or watermarks; overcrowding; toy-like glossiness; 2D flat projections; neon glow; cyan-orange tones; oversaturation; perspective collapse; mismatched reflections; anatomical anomalies; extraneous limbs; distorted faces; excessive outlines; stripes; vignetting.  
Design Objective: The entire venue functions as a contemporary art piece themed around the reference image, with the innermost structure forming a unified experience. Tactile paving and light flow are perfectly synchronized, creating clear focal points. Visitors will be immersed within the space itself, and even during reproduction, SSIM will remain stable at 0.95 or above.

items.contentEnglish:
Illustration Processing:
Background removed; characters transformed into figures and merchandise.

Theme / Overview:
A realistic cinema lounge area. A special event themed space set inside a popcorn stand, decorated with elements from the characters' worlds.

Location:
A spacious cinema popcorn kiosk featuring a cash register and popcorn machine inside.
There is a beverage counter with a clerk behind it.
Posters of currently showing movies are pasted above the cash register.

Characters / Display:
Cosplayers positioned at the center of the scene.
Merchandise such as figures and acrylic standees displayed on shelves.
Large plush toys and signage presented in a realistic manner.
A movie-themed photo booth decorated with character design elements is set up.

Reflections of Characters:
Posters of movies currently in theaters.
Pop-up advertisements for related menus.
Drink cups and packaging.
Popcorn buckets.
Large LED LCD screens.

Design / Promotion:
Character illustrations reflected on every poster in the lounge.
Vivid visuals showcasing linked food and beverage items.
Animations and character images projected onto the LED screens.

Camera Angle:
Frontal composition.
Emphasizing the entire popcorn stand.
Cosplayer positioned at the center, surrounded by merchandise and promotional ads.
Slightly low-angle shot to highlight the LED screens and posters.

Image Quality / Atmosphere:
Realistic and detailed.
Urban, authentic gloss to create a cinema-like ambiance and lively atmosphere.
Resolution: 4K; Aspect ratio: 4:3.

Background erased; characters transformed into figures and merchandise.

Realistic interior of a Tokyo train. The entire carriage is decorated with character advertisements and merchandise, creating a special space designed for collaboration events.

Life-sized figures and character merchandise are displayed in the middle and rear sections of the train.

Character illustrations are featured on hanging strap ads inside the carriage.
Character artwork is displayed on posters and banners throughout the train interior.
Additional LED screens show character illustrations and animations.

Background erased; characters converted into figures and merchandise.
Realistic depictions of life-sized figures, 100cm figures, chibi-style figures, and plush toys.

Wide shot of cosplayers in the foreground, with figures, display boards, and plush toys in the background.
Low-angle shot to highlight hanging strap ads and LED screens.

Realistic and detailed.
Urban, authentic gloss and lighting.
Resolution 4K, aspect ratio 4:3.

Create a realistic image of a theme park based on the original picture.  
The theme park and its characters should be rendered in an extremely realistic style. The scene is set during daytime with bright sunshine.  
Extract the color scheme and design elements from the original image and apply them to various park facilities and structures.  
Elements included in the image should be: vehicles and buildings designed based on the original image; mascot costumes that are moderately exaggerated but inspired by the original image; and signs featuring the original image.  
The mascot costumes should incorporate elements from the original image but be slightly stylized to enhance realism.  
The sizes of characters and mascot costumes must be proportionate and realistic.  
Even if the original image has an anime style, the final generated image must depict a realistic theme park.  
Please strictly follow these guidelines.

Create an image of a fictional constellation based on the original picture.
- The starry night background must be realistic; even if the original image is in an anime style, the starry sky should appear lifelike.
- Extract characters, animals, or objects from the original image and overlay them transparently onto the starry background. In this case, the extracted element should be a single main subject (primary motif), and only one image should be placed.
- The character design, style, and aesthetic of the original image must be faithfully preserved; the background of the original image can be ignored.
- Based on the placed main element, create a fictional constellation. The constellation should consist of approximately 5 to 10 stars.
- Analyze the pose of the original image, and position the stars of the constellation at key points of the character or object logically.
- The stars of the constellation should be highlighted and connected with glowing lines to form the shape of the constellation.

items.contentEnglish:
Analyze the uploaded photo to detect its main subject, mood, and atmosphere.  
Automatically categorize the photo into an appropriate film genre (romance, action, mystery, horror, etc.).  
Based on the detected genre and mood, generate the following content in English:  
- **Movie Title:** Impactful and fitting the style of the genre.  
- **Tagline / Slogan:** 1â€“2 lines, dramatic or emotionally evocative.  
- **Bottom Credits:** Include fictional names for director, producer, composer, etc., styled like a real movie poster.  
- **Release Information:** Such as â€œCOMING SOONâ€ or â€œIn Theaters 2025.â€  

Overlay these elements onto the photo to create a movie poster style:  
- The title prominently displayed in the center or lower third.  
- The tagline placed above or below the title.  
- Credits at the bottom in smaller font.  
- Release info at the bottom center.  
- Add starring information in the following fixed format:  
  **"Starring: <Actor Names>"**  
  Font style: bold, dramatic, matching the genre.  

The final result should resemble a real movie poster, with all elements harmonized to match the photoâ€™s mood and atmosphere.

items.contentEnglish:
Prompt: A 2160x3840 pixel (4K) Ultra-Realistic Digital Photo Masterpiece Triptych. The image is a vertical canvas divided into three equal horizontal panels. The main subject, whose face must be 100% identical to the reference photo, is a young woman with long, flowing hair and a flat, nostalgic expression, possessing deep, intelligent eyes. Her outfit is a loose winter black puffer set with wide-cut trousers and a black scarf. The overall mood is melancholy and solitude, set in a snow-covered white landscape with a muted color palette.
Panel 1 (Portrait Shot): A medium portrait of the character holding a transparent umbrella, silently looking back while gazing directly into the warm glow of a fire. The background is heavily blurred (bokeh), featuring pine trees, a strong aurora borealis, and deep white snow.
Panel 2 (Full Body Shot): A full-body shot captured from a high, looking-down camera angle. The character stands alone in a vast, open snowfield with scattered pine trees and a few bare, leafless trees. She holds the umbrella, walking while gazing up at the aurora-filled sky, with one hand raised as if catching falling snowflakes in the distance. The scene conveys smallness and isolation against the vastness of nature.
Panel 3 (Close Up Shot): A tight close-up of the character's face, featuring a flat, distant gaze that evokes feelings of loneliness and longing. The background includes pine trees, the soft aurora glow, and visible snowfall.
Technical Specifications: Captured with a Hasselblad X2D 100C camera and a Fujifilm GF 45mm f/2.8 R WR lens (to maintain quality across all perspectives). Soft, dim night lighting is used, with warm contrast from the fire in Panel 1. Focus on the textured puffer material, the soft snow, and the luminous quality of the aurora. Cinematic coloring with a strong emphasis on cold tones and melancholy atmosphere.
Facial Constraint: Crucial: Use the attached photo as the subject reference. Maintain 100% identical facial features: do not alter the appearance of the eyes, hair, nose, lips, front bangs, and face shape from the source photo. The identity must be perfectly preserved across all three panels.

items.contentEnglish:
Veo-3.1 Fast in A dynamic, high-speed chase featuring two modern, black European sports coupes (like a BMW M4 or similar), racing down a scenic, winding mountain highway. The clip focuses on the moment the rear car aggressively overtakes the lead car. The action should feel fast, powerful, and exhilarating.
Camera Movement (Crucial):
 * Start (0-2 seconds): Begin with a low-angle, aggressive tracking shot held tightly to the rear bumper and glowing LED taillights of the trailing car (the one closest to the camera in the image). Show the road rushing underneath with intense motion blur.
 * Mid-Sequence (2-6 seconds): The camera executes a smooth, rapid cinematic pull-out and arcing pan to the left, following the trailing car as it surges forward into the adjacent lane to overtake. Briefly capture both cars side-by-side, emphasizing the motion blur on the background trees and road texture.
 * End (6-8 seconds): The camera stabilizes and locks onto a mid-to-high angle just ahead of the new lead car, showcasing the open road ahead and the sunlight streaking through the trees. The final two seconds hold this dynamic, fast-moving perspective.
Style & Aesthetics:
 * Aesthetic: Cinematic, hyper-realistic, high-fidelity game engine render quality (like Unreal Engine 5 or Forza Motorsport).
 * Color Palette: Rich, warm autumn colors (deep golds, oranges, browns) contrasted with the deep black cars and vibrant blue sky.
 * Lighting: Golden Hour lighting. Intense, directional sun flare and volumetric light shafts cutting through the pine and deciduous trees on the right side of the frame, creating dramatic shadows and highlights across the road and the cars' bodies.
 * Motion: Extreme depth-of-field and radial motion blur applied to the background and the road to amplify the sense of speed, keeping the cars relatively sharp.
